Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute at 63rd/Fairfield
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, Western, 59th, California and  63rd, due to fire department activity near 63rd/Fairfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, Western, 59th, California, then resume their normal routes on 63rd, due to fire department activity near 63rd/Fairfield.

Allow extra travel time.
